snippet: Blake Mills has quickly grown a reputation as a virtuosic guitarist, but his songwriting takes center stage on his album “Heigh Ho,” being released on Tuesday.
abstract: Blake Mills, who has built reputation as virtuosic guitarist playing with best musicians in business, releases his own album, entitled Heigh Ho.
lead_paragraph: Blake Mills has quickly grown a reputation as a virtuosic guitarist, but his songwriting takes center stage on his album “Heigh Ho,” being released on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Blake Mills Releases His Second Album, ‘Heigh Ho’
headline.main: A Rising Guitarist Tries a New Challenge
headline.print_headline: A Rising Guitarist Tries a New Challenge
